review: Need more things tho but it good
author: Justin Martinez

review: Love, love, love this!!  Very simple to install - plug and play.  Getting Pandora on my TV is great.  Also, it cycles through my pictures on my phone and puts it on the TV as wallpaper.  And, of course, I don't need to mention steaming Netflix and Hulu movies straight to the TV.  Best buy ever!
author: Suzanne Sheath

review: Works well but you have to download google chrome to use it.
author: David Kozakewich

review: The Chromecast is really a great device in an era where streaming is becoming the preferred method of media consumption.Chromecast is a small, inexpensive device that allows you to mirror whatever you see in your Chrome tab, and it does so very well.
